name: Kale and Cheese Crackers
author: Cheerios
summary: A light cracker with a cheesy flavor and green kale to make it a savory cracker good for soups and appetizers.
ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Combine kale and softened butter together in a bowl until a smooth paste forms
Add Cheddar cheese, oat bran, and milk to paste and mix until well blended
Stir all-purpose flour, whole wheat pastry flour, salt, and ginger into paste mixture until dough easily pulls away from the sides of the bowl, adding more flour if dough is sticky
Chill dough in refrigerator for 30 minutes
Roll dough to 1/2-inch-thickness on a lightly floured surface
Cut dough into rounds using a cookie cutter or small lid and place on the prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes
